## Defining and re-exporting `tidy()`, `glance()` and `augment()` generics

```{r}

#' @importFrom modelgenerics tidy
#' @export
modelgenerics::tidy

#' @export
tidy.dusty <- function(x, ...) {
  tibble::tibble(x)
}
```
